name: Monster Dungeon (Fib)
description:
A 2 player, local co-op, traditional platformer in a monster dungeon. Find the key then get to the door. There's 12 levels with a final boss at the end. About 1  hour of gameplay, but If you want to go back and collect all the stars & monster tokens then maybe 2 hours.

I made this game for my 6 year old daughter. She said she wanted to make a game, then proceeded to draw out levels and monsters in crayon. I took those drawings and made a game for her so we could play it together. I also consulted her on how most of the mechanics should work.

Have fun!
